japanese: 私の夫も、先生よ。
english: My husband is a teacher, too.

japanese: トムは盗んだ車で逃走した。
english: Tom escaped in a stolen car.

japanese: 少なくとも、怪我はしなかったね。
english: At least you didn't get hurt.

japanese: まさしくそんな感じですよ。
english: That's exactly how I feel about that.

japanese: 私がトムを見かけたときは、メアリーと一緒でしたよ。
english: Tom was with Mary when I saw him.

japanese: トムは頼りになる？
english: Is Tom dependable?

japanese: すみません。トムさんですか？
english: Excuse me. Are you Tom?

japanese: トムもカナダ人なの？
english: Is Tom a Canadian, too?

japanese: ドアの鍵あけて！
english: Unlock the door!

japanese: これって、鉛筆なの？
english: Is this a pencil?

japanese: これは、クマ？
english: Is this a bear?

japanese: トムは手紙を書くつもりだ。
english: Tom is going to write a letter.

japanese: いいえ、ドイツ人ではなくて、トルコ人です。
english: No, I'm not German, I'm Turkish.

japanese: いいえ。ドイツ人じゃなくて、トルコ人です。
english: No, I'm not a German, I'm a Turk.

japanese: クレジットカードで支払います。
english: I pay by credit card.

japanese: トムと張り合ってるの？
english: Are you competing with Tom?

japanese: トムと勝負してるの？
english: Are you competing with Tom?

japanese: トムと勝負するつもりなの？
english: Will you be competing with Tom?

japanese: ここがトムの事務所なの？
english: Is this Tom's office?

japanese: ここがトムの職場なの？
english: Is this Tom's office?

japanese: ここがトムの仕事場なの？
english: Is this Tom's office?

japanese: 鍵はソファーの下にあったよ。
english: I found my keys under the couch.

japanese: 次の月曜は祝日です。
english: Next Monday is a national holiday.

japanese: やってみたいな。
english: I would like to try it.

japanese: それ、してみたいな。
english: I would like to try it.

japanese: 試してみたいな。
english: I would like to try it.

japanese: １０分も遅刻です。
english: I'll be late by ten more minutes.

japanese: リスが木の実を食べています。
english: The squirrel is eating a nut.

japanese: 灰色が好き。
english: I like the color gray.

japanese: あの時幸せだった？
english: Were you happy at that time?

japanese: その時嬉しかった？
english: Were you happy at that time?

japanese: トムだってチームの一員だよ。
english: Tom is part of the team, too.

japanese: 彼はハンサムだ。
english: He's handsome.

japanese: 彼はハンサムです。
english: He's handsome.

japanese: 君は最高だリサ！
english: You're the best, Lisa!

japanese: 虫の居所が悪いの？
english: Did you wake up on the wrong side of the bed?

japanese: 虫の居所でも悪いの？
english: Did you wake up on the wrong side of the bed?

japanese: トムさえも俺たちを助けようとはしなかったんだ。
english: Even Tom didn't try to help us.

japanese: パベルなら、１２時１０分に昼飯食べに行ったよ。
english: Pavel went to lunch at twelve-ten.

japanese: パべルは１２時１０分にランチに行きましたよ。
english: Pavel went to lunch at twelve-ten.

japanese: 「もう2時？」「いや、1時5分だ」
english: "Is it already two?" "No, it's just five after one."

japanese: ２時１５分です。
english: It's a quarter after two.

japanese: 「バンガロールは今何時なの？」「１時だよ」
english: "What time is it in Bangalore?" "One o'clock."

japanese: 「オムスクは今何時？」「1時」
english: "What time is it in Omsk?" "It's one."

japanese: 信じれないかもしれないけど、その女の子は2歳です。
english: The girl is two years old, believe it or not.

japanese: 鏡が割れちゃった。
english: The mirror broke.

japanese: 鏡が壊れた。
english: The mirror broke.

japanese: トムはシャツにアイロンかけてたよ。
english: Tom was ironing his shirt.

japanese: トムは仕事に没頭していた。
english: Tom was absorbed in his work.

japanese: トムは仕事に熱中してたよ。
english: Tom was absorbed in his work.

japanese: トムは父親に会うため、急いでいた。
english: Tom was in a hurry to see his father.

japanese: トムは食べる前に手を洗った。
english: Tom washed his hands before eating.

japanese: トムは涙ながらにテレビを見ていた。
english: Tom was watching TV with tears in his eyes.

japanese: トムはお前と同じくらいの年齢の少年だ。
english: Tom is a boy about your age.

japanese: トムは通訳士として雇われました。
english: Tom was engaged as an interpreter.

japanese: トムは通訳として雇われました。
english: Tom was hired as an interpreter.

japanese: トムっていつも私の粗探しばかりするの。
english: Tom is always finding fault with me.

japanese: 試験の前、トムがピリピリしてたんだ。
english: Tom was nervous before the exam.

japanese: 試験前にトムは緊張していた。
english: Tom was nervous before the exam.

japanese: 試験の前は緊張したよ。
english: I was nervous before the exam.

japanese: トムはメアリーの笑顔に騙されたんだ。
english: Tom was taken in by Mary's smile.

japanese: トムは高校時代、数学が得意だった。
english: Tom was good at mathematics in high school.

japanese: ダンスのレッスンを受けました。
english: I took dance lessons.

japanese: 彼女、携帯を買ったのよ。
english: She bought a phone.

japanese: 彼女らは病気です。
english: They are sick.

japanese: 彼らは病気だ。
english: They are sick.

japanese: リストにトムの家族の名前を追加しました。
english: I added Tom's family name to the list.

japanese: 一覧表にトムの家族の名前を付け加えたよ。
english: I added Tom's family name to the list.

japanese: ほとんどの人は戦争が嫌いだ。
english: Most people hate war.

japanese: その靴、いくらしたの？
english: How much did those shoes cost?

japanese: トムとはいつどこで会ったの？
english: When and where did you meet Tom?

japanese: 初めての海外旅行でした。
english: It was my first trip aboard.

japanese: うちの子ね、先生に褒められたのよ。
english: The teacher praised our son.

japanese: 先生が息子のこと、褒めてくれたのよ。
english: The teacher praised our son.

japanese: このギター、弦が一本足りないよ。
english: This guitar is missing a string.

japanese: このギター、弦が一本ないよ。
english: This guitar is missing a string.

japanese: このビザはまずい。
english: This pizza is terrible.

japanese: 猫を起こさないで！
english: Don't wake the cat.

japanese: あの店のピザは、本当に不味い。
english: Their pizza is really bad.

japanese: 多くの人たちが試みました。
english: Lots of people have tried.

japanese: たくさんの人たちがやってみた。
english: Lots of people have tried.

japanese: トムは妻の両親が苦手だ。
english: Tom doesn't like his wife's parents.

japanese: 雪は降ってないよね。
english: It isn't snowing, is it?

japanese: トムはメアリーにドレスを買ってあげた。
english: Tom bought a dress for Mary.

japanese: トムはケーキが大好きなのよ。
english: Tom loves cake.

japanese: ご存知でしたか？
english: Did you know it?

japanese: 知っていましたか？
english: Did you know it?

japanese: 知ってた？
english: Did you know it?

japanese: 子守唄を歌って。
english: Sing me a lullaby.

japanese: オオカミは何を食べるの？
english: What does a wolf eat?

japanese: 鮫は魚を餌としている。
english: Sharks feed on fish.

japanese: カモメは何を食べるの？
english: What do seagulls eat?

japanese: 君とご飯を食べたかった。
english: I wanted to eat with you.

japanese: ボストンに一緒に行ってくれる人を探してるんだけど。
english: I'm looking for someone to travel to Boston with me.

japanese: ヒッチハイクって、したことある？
english: Have you ever hitchhiked?

japanese: トムからテキストを受け取ったよ。
english: I got a text from Tom.

japanese: 前の仕事をクビになったんだ。
english: I got fired from my last job.

japanese: 本当にトムがやると思ってるの？
english: Do you really think that Tom will do that?

japanese: トムなら自分の部屋でフランス語の勉強してるよ。
english: Tom is in his room, studying French.

japanese: みんながトムを信頼しているんだ。
english: Everyone trusts Tom.

japanese: これは花です。
english: This is a flower.

japanese: 私ね、フランス語を習う気満々なのよ。
english: I'm very motivated to learn French.

japanese: トムとメアリーは狩りに行ったよ。
english: Tom and Mary went hunting.

japanese: テニスは年中やってるよ。
english: I play tennis all year.

japanese: 泥棒の姿は一瞬見ただけです。
english: I only got a short glimpse of the thief.

japanese: 僕らはここではいつもフランス語を話す。
english: We speak French all the time here.

japanese: 私の親友は中国人です。
english: My best friend is Chinese.

japanese: 給料日までお金を貸してもらえませんか？
english: Could you loan me some money until payday?

japanese: トムはずぶ濡れです。
english: Tom is soaking wet.

japanese: トムと話すのは楽しいよ。
english: Tom is fun to talk to.

japanese: トムは私たちの通訳です。
english: Tom is our interpreter.

japanese: トムは我々の通訳じゃ。
english: Tom is our interpreter.

japanese: トムは上機嫌だ。
english: Tom is in high spirits.

japanese: 今、トムは酔ってるのよ。
english: Tom is drunk now.

japanese: トムが学校でいじめられたんだ。
english: Tom got bullied at school.

japanese: 犬がトムに襲い掛かった。
english: A dog attacked Tom.

japanese: 馬がトムを噛んだ。
english: A horse bit Tom.

japanese: 馬がトムを蹴った。
english: A horse kicked Tom.

japanese: ゴルフボールがトムに当たった。
english: A golf ball hit Tom.

japanese: 彼のしたことは手っ取り早く言えば詐欺だ。
english: What he did is, in plain language, fraud.

japanese: トムは見るからに怖がっている。
english: Tom is obviously terrified.

japanese: トムはフライドポテトを調理している。
english: Tom is making french fries.

japanese: トムはメアリーの雇用に反対なんだ。
english: Tom is against hiring Mary.
